ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Permission.Override_Validation ), NOT(ISBLANK( Verified_Supplier_Start_Date__c )), OR( ISBLANK( TEXT(Assortment__c) ), ISBLANK( Secondary_Assortment__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please insert all data for verified suppliers: Description, Logo, (primary & secondary) Assortment and Cover Photo
